name: EPA_RENEWALS
description: This table holds information about electronic prior authorization (ePA) renewals.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the referral record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EPA_CHILD_RFL_ID
columns.description: This item stores any additional prior authorization for medication referrals for the medication order linked in Referral Files (I RFL 17000-Medication Orders)
